REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to non-compliant dwellings and harm reduction services
Summary: Establishes the definitions of non-compliant dwelling and harm reduction services and provides that every patient in a chemical dependence residential service or in a residential service that has a length of stay of thirty days or more shall have the right to remain unless removed through a special proceeding under article seven of the real property actions and proceedings law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to non-compliant dwellings and harm reduction services
